title: Riot kayle bug
body: I play lol about every day. I already have riot Kayle so i am supposed to get a mystery but i have yet to get it. All ny friends either got riot kayle or a mystery so i am a little upset please help me.

replies.body: It's not a bug. I haven't got her yet either; we just need to wait. It is an issue if we haven't got it by the 23rd though, in which we should send a support ticket like SkyBlade suggests.

> [{quoted}](name=BananaSlayerAMO,realm=OCE,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=KhMOtZEW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-17T12:45:54.080+0000)
>
> It's not a bug. I haven't got her yet either; we just need to wait. It is an issue if we haven't got it by the 23rd though, in which we should send a support ticket like SkyBlade suggests.

We're still rolling everything out - while we're moving pretty quickly, it's going to take quite a bit. Please hang tight! :)

Are you supposed to get the icon and the skin at the same time? If so, I got the icon, but it never said I got anything else. I already own riot Kayle, but I have yet to see anything other than the summoner icon
Nope! You'll get them at different times, but they'll be around on or before the 23rd.
Each particular gift is being given out separately, so it's normal to receive one before the other.
Riot said that if you don't have it by the 23rd, you can send them a support ticket and they'll send you her :)
